title: Drowned - Box Of Bones [DVD9] Full image + [CD-RIP]
description:
Box Of Bones is a compilation of unrealesed tracks, plus a DVD containing promo videos, concerts along 3 tours and some extras.

A great brazilian death metal band from Belo Horizonte.
